basics.name: Muhammad Ahmad
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in computer vision and gesture recognition systems. Experienced in developing end-to-end ML solutions with focus on real-time processing and model optimization.

projects.name: GestuNova
projects.description: Developed real-time hand gesture recognition system for computer control
highlights: Developed real-time hand gesture recognition system achieving 95% accuracy in gesture classification
Implemented efficient preprocessing algorithms for hand landmark coordinates using MediaPipe
Created user-friendly GUI for custom gesture-to-command mapping

projects.name: Chess Blunder Detection
projects.description: Built ML system for analyzing chess games
highlights: Built ML system for analyzing chess games using Stockfish engine integration
Implemented recursive algorithm for move sequence evaluation and blunder detection
Developed automated analysis pipeline processing entire tournament histories

projects.name: Hotel Review Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Developed NLP pipeline for sentiment analysis
highlights: Developed NLP pipeline for sentiment analysis of hotel reviews using NLTK
Implemented robust data cleaning and preprocessing algorithms
Created visualization system for sentiment trends and key themes

education.institution: Punjab University College of Information Technology (PUCIT)
